00003     X& Viewport::w2b(DMatrix<X>&m, double x, double y) const 
00004     throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00005         if(!isInside(x,y)) {
00006             throw std::invalid_argument("");
00007         }
00008         int bx,by;
00009         basic_w2b(rmin, rmax, x,y, m.columns(), m.rows(), bx,by, false);
00010         return m[by][bx];
